newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT - Panmure cuts BA estimates.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Panmure cuts BA estimates.

text.p: Earnings estimates for British Airways Plc were cut at Panmure Gordon, reflecting rising fuel costs and declining yields, market sources said on Wednesday.
The stock was down 15-1/2p or 2.6 percent at 583-1/2 by 1447 GMT, outpacing the 1.6 percent in the FTSE 100 index as a whole.
For the current year to March 1997, Panmure cut its estimate for pre-tax profit to 580 million stg from 645 million and for the year after it cut to 600 million stg from 695 million.
The brokerage also repeated a "sell" recommendation on the stock, sources said. Analysts at the brokerage were not immediately available for comment.
